commit message: replace 'test' menu item with 'View Install Log' which shows the install.log
adjust InstallLogView font to make the install log text more readable
add apache commons-io because it has lots of good easy file utils
share the install.log from a button on the Install Log View screen
also restore the savedInstanceState on onCreate() to try to get the log properly restoring
stop-debian.sh: when unmounting, sort the mount list in reverse so nested mounts go first (fixes #26)
force the use of the included 'chroot' since sometimes the built-in ones are too minimal
strangely, the chroot command fails on Samsung Galaxy Player if the PATH is set (fixes #26)
purge the 'run as root' TextEdit since its a big security hole. use Terminal Emulator!
add support for all the weird Samsung mounts on my Galaxy Player 5
create-debian-setup.sh: look for symlinks in / and create them in the debian disk

on start, install the terminal shortcut scripts 'debian' and '/debian/shell' (closes #2)

these scripts make it easy to get a shell in the Debian chroot in
Terminal Emulator and programs like it, but they don't run automatically,
so they don't force the user to always work in the Debian chroot.

If someone wants to only have Debian shells in Terminal Emulator, they
can add /debian/shell in the preferences of Terminal Emulator.
move start, stop and configure scripts to their own private methods for flexible calling
purge some minor cruft
add BroadcastReceiver to stop debian if the SD card is to be unmounted (ACTION_MEDIA_EJECT)
use ACTION_MEDIA_MOUNTED as start trigger, and ACTION_MEDIA_EJECT as stop trigger, replacing OnBoot...
mark the pref key strings as things not to translate
document using NDK_BASE with make, and set default to /opt/android-ndk
set busybox's CONFIG_SYSROOT using NDK_SYSROOT variable
set target version to android-10/2.3.3
set version to v0.3 build 4
